name: Hunteroids
description:
Our cities are under attack! Tons of meteories are coming from the space to destroy us! Our sophisticated weapon will make them disappear but we cannot use it because of our fragile legs! Luckly, you are here to help!

But... You can only hunt one kind of meteorite with specific shape, color and rotation...

No worries! Create bubbles in the sky to transform all meteorites into the pattern given by the weapon and hunt them! Change their shape, color and rotation and save the city!




The Basic Mechanics are shown in the picture below.



Meteorites will come from the sky to destroy the city. Your goal is to create bubbles to transform them into the pattern given by your weapon.

There are 3 types of bubbles:

  • Red Bubbles: They will change the shape of the meteorites (square, circle, triangle).
  • Blue Bubbles: They will change the colour of the meteorites (green, pink, blue).
  • Yellow Bubbles: They will change the rotation of the meteorites.

And remember! The bigger the bubble is, the more transformations the meteorite will suffer!


CAMPAIGN


  • You have been chosen to protect all our cities from meteorites! There are 5 levels per city (meteor showers). Will each city survive the attack? It depends on you!
  • Each city will bring new mechanisms!
  • The number of cities available will depend on the version you have. See "Versions" section for more detailed information.
  • For certain cities, if you get 3 stars, you will get an achievement.
  • For certain cities, if you save them, you will unblock new challenges.
  • If you save the first 3 cities, you will unblock the Survival Mode.
  • Online Leaderboard: Compite with other players and be part of the Hall Of Fame!

CHALLENGES


  • Different types of challenges: Life, Bubbles, Time or combination of all of them.
  • Per challenge, you will have limited Life, number of Bubbles and Time to survive!
  • The challenges will be linked to the campaign mode and the city (and mechanics) learnt!
  • Steam Achievements if you manage to success and get 3 stars!
  • Online Leaderboard: Compite with other players and be part of the Hall Of Fame!

SURVIVAL


  • Survive as many levels as possible and transform the maximum number of meteorites among other players.
  • Online Leaderboard: Compite with other players and be part of the Hall Of Fame!




Hunteroids will be delivered in two releases:

DEMO

The Demo has the following features:

  • 3 basic cities with 9 levels + 3 improved tutorials explaining the basis
  • Gamepad support
  • English/Spanish support
  • Steam in the Cloud
  • Local Scores (Stars, Life, Bubbles, Time)

FULL VERSION ROADMAP


The following features will be included in the Full Version:

  • 8 cities (+40 levels) in the Campaign Mode. Each city with different mechanics
  • Steam Achievements
  • Steam in the Cloud
  • Statistics
  • Gamepad Support
  • Challenges
  • Survival
